data: Adding Niantic Friends with Your Contacts List

Easily connect with Niantic Friends by letting Niantic periodically upload your Contacts list. Revoke permission through your device's settings at any time and manage discoverability in your Niantic Profile settings.
You choose which contacts to be friends with.
You have not enabled the permission for Contacts. It can be enabled in your device's app settings.
{0} needs access to your contacts to send game invites and friend requests to people in your address book.
Enjoy playing with friends when you invite them from your contact list!
How would you like to contact {0}?
In order to add a new Niantic Friend, your contact must remove a current Niantic Friend
In order to add a new Niantic Friend, you must remove a current Niantic Friend
Let others send me Friend Requests if I am in their imported Contacts
Your contact, {0}, thought you might enjoy playing {1} together. Would you like to join them?
You can both receive bonuses by using their referral code {0} when you sign up.
Follow this link if you're interested: {0}
They look forward to adventuring together with you!
I thought you might enjoy playing {1} together. Would you like to join me?
We can both receive bonuses by using my referral code {0} when you sign up.
Follow this link if you're interested: {0}
I look forward to adventuring together!
Something went wrong when submitting your name. Please try again.
Found inappropriate content in the submitted name. Please remove the offending text and try again.
Found inappropriate content in the name of the contact. Please remove the offending text and try again.
Something went wrong when sending an invite to this contact. Please try again.
Something went wrong when retrieving your contact information. Please check your connection and try again later.
You have too many pending invites.
Your contact has too many pending invites.
Contacts will see this name on invites and friend requests. Change your stored name at any time on your Niantic Profile.
Contacts will see this name when you invite them to games or send Friend Requests from your contact book.
Let Friends Discover You in Niantic Apps
If others use their contact list to search for new friends, you can now choose to make yourself visible and connect with them in the app!
This can be changed at any time in your Niantic Profile settings.
Easily connect with Niantic Friends by letting Niantic periodically upload your Contacts list. Revoke permission through your device's settings at any time.
Using the same Google, Facebook or Apple login across Niantic Games will link your accounts. This will give you credit for achievements in your Niantic Profile.
Learn what is shared with friends.
Changing the nickname here will change the nickname you see for this friend in all Niantic Games.
Are you sure you want to unlink this account?
This action will unlink this account across all Niantic Games where you use this login.
Could not set this friend's nickname.
Couldn't retrieve profile data. Please check your connection and try again later.
Could not remove this account. It is linked to your active game session.
See if your friends are online and which Niantic Game they are playing.
View achievements and discover other Niantic games your friends are playing.
View your friends from other Niantic games & invite them to play together.
Your Online Status will let friends know when you are available to play. You will also be able to see when your friends are playing other Niantic games.
You can turn on Online Status now or turn it on or off using the Online/Offline toggle on your Friend List.
Note: Turning on Online Status will enable it for all Niantic games you play which have this feature.
Could not get your privacy settings.
Could not set your privacy settings.
Let my Friends see info about the last time I played Niantic Games.
This account is already linked to an existing player.
Can't unlink this account! Please link an additional login method to unlink this one.
Step outside and discover Pokémon in the real world! Catch Pokemon, battle Trainers, and defeat Team GO Rocket.
Discover the magic of the Wizarding World with millions of witches and wizards around the globe. Your wizarding adventure awaits!
Join millions of Agents in a global struggle for the future of humanity in this planet-scale, competitive game.
Let my Friends see my usernames from all Niantic Games.
Are you sure you want to unfriend {0}?
Removing this friend from this Niantic game will remove them as a friend in all games you both play.
Harvest. Trade. Build. Explore the world through CATAN.

There was an error when sending the invite. Please try again later.
Adding friends in this game will add them as a friend in all Niantic games you both play.
New social features are beginning to roll out!
Removing this friend from this Niantic app will remove them as a friend in all apps you both use.
Adding friends in this app will add them as a friend in all Niantic apps you both use.
Use your contact book to find new friends and send invites to play.
